channel.title: Documentation :: SHARE-CZ Project in the Czech Republic
channel.description: SHARE Project Documentation Complete documentation of the SHARE project for all participating countries can be found in English on the official website: ğŸ”— https://share-eric.eu Data documentation: https://share-eric.eu/data/ ğŸŒ International Portals Gateway to Global Data on Ageing (USC) Access to international ageing studies (USA, UK, Ireland, China, India, Japan, etc.) with an interactive data explorer and basic calculations: ğŸ”— https://g2aging.org/ SHARE Data Online Explorer Interactive browser of data from waves 1â€“8: ğŸ”— https://www.share-datadocutool.org What Is the Documentation For? Each wave includes a set of documents: main questionnaires, showcards, drop-off questionnaires, codebooks, and methodology.
